title: Sick to death
body:
I'm sick to death of people trolling in fun game modes and their reply is that its a fun game mode so they are allowed to troll, its being a fun game mode isnt license to troll, its still breaking the games rules.
Riot what can i do, i report so many people that i know my reporting will have lost value, but people still think that just because theres no tribunal it means theres no punishment for breaking the rules, its at the point where ive played 6 games of URF and its just not fun, every game is full of trolls who just say its URF get over it dont take it seriously, but it DOESN'T matter what game mode it is trolling and being a dick is still bannable
